alert.note: Alert for Kent; New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:23PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern New Castle and northeastern Kent Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 423 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Smyrna, or 11 miles north of Dover, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dover, Smyrna, Clayton, Cheswold, Rising Sun-Lebanon, Woodland Beach, Green Spring, Rising Sun, Dover Base Housing, Dover Speedway, Townsend, Little Creek, Leipsic, Chambersville, Kent Acres, Highland Acres and Rodney Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
